content.rendered:
Directed by Shanker Raman

Written by Mehak Jamal. Shanker Raman. Kunal Sharma. Yogi Singha

Star Bobby Deol (Viraj Singh Dagar). Vikrant Massey (Ashu). Sanya Malhotra (Jyoti Dilawar). Raj Arjun (DCP Sushil Rathi). Yogi Singha (Jhakkad Sub Inspector). Swaroopa Ghosh (MLA Kamala Dilawar). Aditi Vasudev (Nidhi Dahiya). Simran Rawal (Babli Dilawar (Jyoti’s Sister)). Yogesh Tiwari (Randhir Dilawar (Jyoti’s Father)). Kumkum Jain (Savita Dilawar (Jyoti’s Mother)). Gopal Sethi (Ashu’s Father). Yudhvir Ahlawat (Rakesh Dilawar (Jyoti’s Brother)). Sidharth Bhardwaj (Chaudhary (Safe Home Incharge)). Vishal Om Prakash (Advocate Ashok Khanna). Arun Marwah (Judge). Sonal Jha (Sujata Rathi (DCP’s wife)). Seema Raaj (Ashu’s Mother (as Seema Raja))

Language Hindi

Producers Vikram Arora. Raghav Gupta. Supriya Guru. Gauri Khan. Kapil Madnani. Manish Mundra. Dharam Soni. Gaurav Verma

Production Drishyam Films. Red Chillies Entertainment
